page.title: 10The Carnival
page.content: The Carnival started over fifty years ago and used to raise money for the local hospitals as there was no {National Health Service.}Nowadays the money goes to many local{charities. } This year one of the charities was for deaf children at a school in Weddington. Equipment to help their hearing was bought. The other aim was for everyone to have{fun.} The{Carnival Queen}is picked at a dance in April. The Carnival consists of a procession of floats and people in fancy dress. Everyone carries a bucket to collect money in. Marching bands join in the procession which is led by the{Mayor's car.}Each year the Carnival has a theme, in 1985 it was {"The World of Make Believe."}The event is held on the first Saturday in June and is followed by a gala on the Sunday.
